title: Kalista Bond Bug

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
I just had a game where I used my spear on my support Alistar at the beginning of the game, I saw his death animation play, as Kalista passive always works, but I wasn't bonded to him.

We couldn't proc the passive for W.

I couldn't ult him.

I tried re-buying the spear, and using it again on every ally in the game, and it played the sound, but no animation, and I could never bond with anyone.

Match history in link

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2092089284/33069576

replies.body:
Hey Dr Dancakes MD - 

Would you happen to have a video of this happening? Is this happening every game, or was this something that only occurred in the game you've provided with the match history.

We are aware of an issue where if you bind to someone and then re-bind to someone else, like you've mentioned above, it doesn't bind properly, and you aren't able to proc the W passive. However, it sounds like you aren't able to bind with anyone. D:

Thank you for the quick reply KateyKhaos! I appreciate it!

Unfortunately I do not have a video of the game sorry.

I have played Kalista many times before and have NEVER had this issue before.

I didn't try to rebind until I realized my original bind wasn't working, so yeah, I'd say it was the latter situation.  It was not a good way to start a ranked game!

No need to apologize! Definitely not a fun way to play Kalista, especially when you have such a good engage with Alistar. D: I've gone ahead and poked the team working on this so they've got it up on their radar. :]
you can go to replay.gg and see if the game is still there
